sentences.en: Another way to work smarter is by distinguishing busy from productive.
sentences.cn: 另外一种巧干之道是区别能干和忙碌.

sentences.en: Do you prefer underdog role? - I do. - Is It'smarter at this point?
sentences.cn: 你喜欢居下风者的角色 吗 ? - 我喜欢. - 此刻是不是更加机智?

sentences.en: He thinks he's smarter than Sarah is.
sentences.cn: 他认为自己比萨拉聪明。

sentences.en: If he is smarter than you ,he is great,but you are fool.
sentences.cn: 如果他比你聪明，他就是有智慧，而你是傻瓜。

sentences.en: If they're wise, they can put to use , and appear smarter.
sentences.cn: 如果他们明智, 他们就能学以致用, 使自己变得更游刃有余.

sentences.en: If they're wise, they can to use , and appear smarter.
sentences.cn: 如果他们明智, 他们就能学以致用,使自己变得更游刃有馀.

sentences.en: IF YOU WANT TO APPEAR SMARTER, HANG AROUND SOMEONE STUPIDER.
sentences.cn: 想要显得聪明.整天跟笨人呆在一起.

sentences.en: In this and all of our efforts, we intend to work smarter, not lower our standards or quality of service.
sentences.cn: 通过我们这些努力，我们想要更聪明地开展工作，而并不降低我们的标准或服务的质量。

sentences.en: Judy Witwicky at thellos place, I feel that they have become smarter.
sentences.cn: 茱迪:“瞧瞧这地方, 我觉得本身都变聪明了. ”

sentences.en: People came out in smarter clothes to promenade along the front.
sentences.cn: 人们穿上更加时髦漂亮的衣服，沿着海滨散步。

sentences.en: So, yes, you might have been really smart in the past, but you could be smarter, I guess, is part of the situation.
sentences.cn: 所以，是的，您也许在过去一直都很聪明，但是您本来还是可以变得更加聪明的，我想这就是一部分情况吧。

sentences.en: The longer he was around , the smarter Golz seemed.
The result is a much smarter and faster intranet application.
sentences.cn: 其结果就是更智能、更快捷的内部网应用.

sentences.en: Two women areare arguing about which dog is smarter.
sentences.cn: 两位妇女争论谁家的狗更聪明.

sentences.en: What does a smarter grid look like at home?
sentences.cn: 什么是聪明格在家里看 呢 ?

sentences.en: You must make the commitment to market smarter by picking better target.
sentences.cn: 你必须相办法更精准地选择目标客群,让行销作业更省力.

sentences.en: You will find that your dogs a lot smarter than you thought.
sentences.cn: 你会发现你的狗比你想像的要聪明的多.

words.tran_cn: 聪明的；精明的（smart的比较级）

trans.tran_cn: 聪明的；精明的(smart的比较级)
